title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Follow Peter Parker as he teams up with other Spider-People from different dimensions to stop a multiversal threat.

title: Dune
description: Journey to the desert planet of Arrakis and witness the epic battle for control of its valuable resources.

title: Eternals
description: Meet a new team of immortal heroes, the Eternals, who emerge from the shadows to face an ancient enemy.
